def_cn: (用于 bullet，fire 等名词后构成形容词)表示“留下…伤痕的”,“被…损坏的”
def_en: -scarred is used after nouns such as 'bullet' and 'fire' to form adjectives which indicate that something has been damaged or marked by the thing mentioned.

def_cn: (用于battle 或 drug 等名词后构成形容词)表示“留下…创伤的”
def_en: -scarred is used after nouns such as 'battle' or 'drug' to form adjectives which indicate that the thing mentioned has had a permanent effect on someone's mind.
